headline: BXP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: BOSTON, June 20, 2025--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.98 per share of common stock for the period April 1, 2025 to June 30, 2025, payable on July 31, 2025 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 30, 2025.

raw.headline: BXP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: BOSTON, June 20, 2025--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.98 per share of common stock for the period April 1, 2025 to June 30, 2025, payable on July 31, 2025 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 30, 2025.
